intro: What if your world was a lie?
description:
Waking Up in the Lie

You are R3D, an alien robot trapped in a strange simulation. You don’t know who’s pulling the strings—or why—but something feels off. Every move you make might lead you closer to the truth… or deeper into the deception. How far are you willing to go to break free?

Dive into a layered narrative and uncover the hidden motives of those around you. Pay close attention to conversations and search for secret notes—they could hold crucial truths. Don’t let yourself be misled; only the right choices will guide you to freedom when the time comes.

The Collapse

Did you manage to break the simulation? Then brace yourself—now you’ll have to face the General and fight your way out of the lab. New puzzle mechanics await, but this time you’re not alone: turrets and enemies will be hunting you down.

Features

Hand-crafted puzzles that challenge your logic and creativity
A deep, twisting narrative—who can you really trust?
Hidden notes packed with vital information
Action sequences that shift the pace and tone of the game
Multiple endings shaped by your choices
